content: the **baroque triumph floral square** is a 10 square that is perfect for making blankets pillowcases and any other creations using afghan blocks the pattern comes with written instructions and step-by-step photos > this pattern is part of the bouquet of > flowers cal hosted by helen of > sunflower cottage crochet this cal is > totally free click ** here 1 ** to > get all the info **materials** 4 0-mm g/6 us 8 uk hook dk 3 medium weight yarn tapestry needle **size** 10 25 4 cm **gauge** 2 rounds worked in double_crochet in 2 5 cm **this pattern is written in us terms** **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni 1 https //raffamusa--sunflowercottagecrochet thrivecart com/bouquet-of-flowers-aghan/621cb5c2d441a/ 2 https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs 3 https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns
